intro.thanks: Thank you very much for taking your time and checking up on me.
intro.serious: Whether it is for serious work or serious play, or nothing serious at all.

firstPart.intro: Young hearted developer, with passion for awesome designs.
firstPart.title: About Me
texts: I love reading code as well as code things from scratch, and enjoy very much bringing to life ideas on the browser.
I'm a confident and capable individual, enjoy and profit from team work, curious by nature, and perpetually eager and work on improving my skills one problem at a time.
